sessions.title: What is AI, Really?
sessions.description: Break down AI myths, understand AI vs. ML vs. Generative AI, live demos of ChatGPT/image generators, career stories

sessions.title: AI Across Industries
sessions.description: Case studies in healthcare/finance/manufacturing, hands-on exploration of AI tools, program roadmap

weeks.title: Machine Learning Principles & Supervised vs. Unsupervised Learning

sessions.title: How Machines Learn
sessions.description: How machines learn from data, supervised learning walkthrough, live model training demo, hands-on activity

sessions.title: Unsupervised Learning & Applications
sessions.description: Clustering and pattern recognition, hands-on lab with Azure/AWS/Google Cloud

sessions.title: Computer Vision & Image AI
sessions.description: How computers interpret images, real-world applications, live demo of image classification, ethics spotlight

sessions.title: Natural Language Processing & Chatbots
sessions.description: How machines understand language, NLP applications, chatbot architecture, live demo of conversational bot

weeks.title: Generative AI, Large Language Models & Prompt Engineering

sessions.title: Generative AI & Large Language Models
sessions.description: What is Generative AI, LLMs overview (GPT, Claude, Gemini), how LLMs work, transformer architecture

sessions.title: Mastering Prompt Engineering
sessions.description: Prompt engineering techniques, live demos of bad vs. good prompts, hands-on practice with business scenarios

sessions.title: Project #1 Kickoff & Data Analysis Frameworks
sessions.description: Project overview, complete example demo, data analysis framework, dataset selection, hands-on exploratory data analysis

sessions.title: Project #1 Work Session & Peer Feedback
sessions.description: Data visualization best practices, work time with instructor support, peer feedback session, final refinement

weeks.title: Portfolio Project #2 - Industry AI Solution Design

sessions.title: Project #1 Presentations + Project #2 Kickoff
sessions.description: Student presentations of Project #1, solution design framework, industry examples, problem identification

sessions.title: Project #2 Work Session & Solution Design Review
sessions.description: Cost-benefit analysis mini-lesson, work time with instructor guidance, peer review, refinement based on feedback

sessions.title: Project #2 Presentations + Capstone Kickoff
sessions.description: Student presentations of Project #2, capstone options (predictive model, chatbot, prompt engineering portfolio, AI strategy), student pitches

sessions.title: Capstone Work Session & Peer Review
sessions.description: Independent work time, peer review of work-in-progress, feedback on clarity/feasibility/quality, final refinement

sessions.title: Portfolio Showcase Presentations
sessions.description: Capstone presentations (10-minute each per student), portfolio packaging workshop, resume optimization, LinkedIn profile setup

sessions.title: Certification Prep & Career Launch
sessions.description: Certification exam strategies, full-length practice exam, mock interview practice, alumni panel, job search launch
